channel.title: CBC News Northbeat
channel.desc: Issues and news stories of northern Canada.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Still Standing
channel.desc: Oneida Nation of the Thames is hard at work reclaiming the economic, cultural and spiritual practices that were banned by government policies over the past 100 years.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Sally and Tim resolve to help Lou's kids; the police arrest Maria for assault.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Murdoch Mysteries
channel.desc: Murdoch and Watts' efforts to protect a priceless ruby are thwarted by a determined thief.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Saint-Pierre
channel.desc: New-to-town inspector, Fitz, joins forces with local detective Arch to solve the murder of a back-to-nature group leader.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Frankie Drake Mysteries
channel.desc: Mary finds out that the radio play she's acting in is a cover for a heist.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: This Hour Has 22 Minutes
channel.desc: Canadians find a new way to get a grip on winter.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: The National
channel.desc: CBC's flagship nightly news program, featuring the day's top stories with in-depth and original journalism; Adrienne Arsenault and Ian Hanomansing anchor.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Denise Nurse helps a couple with four children navigate Derbyshire's rural housing market.

channel.title: Live: Canada Day 2025
channel.desc: Heather Hiscox kicks off our all-day Canada Day coverage from Charlottetown.

channel.title: Live: Canada Day 2025
